latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Dry Seeding Rice: The Emerging Trend in Fully Irrigated Area

dsDescriptionValue.value: The objective of the study is to document the changes in rice establishment methods in the command area of UPRIIS. It also aims to examine the economics of the 3 methods of rice establishment; transplanting (TPR), wetseeding (WSR) and dryseeding (DSR) in the irrigated areas and to determine farmerâs reasons for their choice of method of rice establishment.

keywordValue.value: Land Use, Land holding, Production Input, Demographics.
